scripts.clean: rm -rf ./node_modules && cd ./server && npm run clean && cd ../client && npm run clean
scripts.setup: npm install && cd ./server && npm run setup && cd ../client && npm run setup
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run watch" "cd ./client && npm run start"
scripts.lint: cd ./server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.serve: concurrently "cd ./server && npm run start" "cd ./client && npm run serve"
